channel.title: Server sourse problems... :(
channel.description: okay im workin on gettin my server source set up and all that good stuff... well i have moparscape v3.2 w/ aryan and i have "testscape source" downloaded and i have everything needed... so i go to testscape sourse and "edit" my compile.bat and runserver.bat files as it sayz in tha guide im usin and after i edit them when i click on "runserver" tha black screen thing pops up for a sec and closes back out... i really hvae no idea what i did wrong... so someone please help... my s/n is darkhero354 if u wanna i/m me, make it much easier..

item.description:
@I_Justin_I wrote:

right click on runserver.bat, click edit, then at the very bottem, add
pause

save then try, i hope i helped.

~| I Justin I |~

item.title: Server sourse problems... :(
